title: What to Do When Your Partner Isn’t Responding | Relationship Theory
description: In this week’s episode of Relationship Theory,  Tom and Lisa talk about how you can effectively remind your partner that you appreciate them so they don’t feel ignored or neglected.   This episode is sposored by Thrive Market!
